gameDetails.name: Cartographers Heroes: Collector's Edition
gameDetails.description:
The Collector's edition of Cartographers Heroes includes a larger box to hold content from expansions, Map Packs 1-3, a mini card expansion, and colored pencils.

The larger box (318 x 227 x 72 mm - Roll Player sized) has room to store additional Cartographers content (sold separately) from Cartographers: A Roll Player Tale, Map Packs 4-6, and the other 3 mini expansions (Skills 1, Ambush, and Champions).

This product includes:

     All the content from the retail edition of Cartographers Heroes
     Custom plastic insert (supports sleeved cards)
     20 Colored Pencils (4 sets of 5 colors)
     Cartographers: Map Pack 1 â€“ Nebblis: Plane of Flame
     Cartographers: Map Pack 2 â€“ Affril: Plane of Knowledge
     Cartographers: Map Pack 3 â€“ Undercity: Depths of Sabek
     Cartographers: Skills Mini Expansion 2
